definition[0]: a game that is played again because neither team won the first time
definition[1]: the playing again of an important part of a sports event being shown on television, usually at a slower speed so that it can be examined it more clearly
example[1]: You can see on the replay that the goalkeeper was fouled.
definition[2]: something that is done exactly as it was before
example[2]: a replay of the same old mistakes
definition[3]: to play a game again because neither team won the first time
example[3]: The match will be replayed on Wednesday.
definition[4]: to show again on television something that has been recorded
example[4]: Highlights of the race were replayed on the news.
explanation[0]: Replay is often used in the passive
